Name: Fearless
description: Being fearless is a beneficial trait in a place of life and dead in battle. Although fear allows person to survive longer to fight another day, so being fearless is more of a double-edge sword.

Name: Fear
description: There should be no fear in the machine of war. Fear makes even the obedient soldier refuse to follow the command after all.

Name: Hope
description: Optimism to survive and see the better days is good. Soldier always fight harder when there is hope.

Name: Hidden
description: Unseen by enemy, ambush them at the right time and you may win this battle effortlessly.

Name: Blind
description: Blindness is pretty much an equivalent of certain death in battle. Unable to both attack and defend, such disability must be treated as soon as possible.

Name: Silence
description: Unable to speak, unable to cast spell. Looking at the bright side, this is the time to replenish mana.

Name: Fight To The Death
description: This unit is already broken but cannot flee from battle. It will fight to the last man.

Name: Sleep
description: While sleeping is good for the body, sleeping at the wrong time and place is not a wise thing to do.

Name: Panic
description: "Forward!, I said forward you fool! Listen to my command!"

Name: Berserk
description: Desolation, destruction, elimination and eradication! Stop at nothing until your enemy is no more.

Name: Orc Berserk
description: Even more devastating and violence than normal berserk, orc berserk make this unit an ultimate killing machine!

Name: Confuse
description: "Where is the enemy? What is going on? Why is everyone around me doing nothing?"

Name: Run Amok
description: Cavalry unit has one downside is that their mounts can run amok from anything that spook them, Be it fire or very loud noise or even stress. This make their mount uncontrollable and will attack anyone in their path.

Name: Unconscious
description: Being unconscious in battle is often a death sentence, especially in melee combat.

Name: Oil
description: Oiled up and ready to be cooked. This unit will catch fire much faster.

Name: Blessed
description: Blessed be the believer. Your god grant you the purpose to fulfill your destiny.

Name: Cursed
description: The damned will walk the earth until no sun longer shines.

Name: Plague
description: Anyone with a plague is dangerous to everyone around him especially when so many people are staying so close in tight formation.

Name: Strong Will
description: Strength in the mind is the foundation of a true strength.

Name: Stun
description: Vision blur, hearing deafen, regain oneself or be perished.

Name: Entangle
description: Entangle to the ground, unable to move. They time to run may yet come so shake off the obstacle as soon as possible.

Name: Focus
description: Focus to accomplish what is necessary. This unit will fight to the fullest without distraction.

Name: Deadly Poison
description: Deadly poison that cannot be cured, very few can survive this painful experience and even fewer can live long life after.

Name: Burn
description: Dead by burning is not a good way to go. Try to drench yourselves as soon as possible.

Name: Freeze
description: Frozen in place and time. Nothing to be done but wait.

Name: Wet
description: Being wet can either be good or bad. Fire and burning become much less effective but air and water damage and effect become a dangerous threat.

Name: Drunk
description: Getting drunk in battle may not be the smartest thing to do, but It sure help raise the morale and fierceness of the troops.

Name: Slow
description: Slowing to a crawl. Best be steady or you may lose both race and war.

Name: Haste
description: Superior speed leads to victory. The momentum is with us to seize any fortune from the enemy.

Name: Flying
description: The dream of flight is now the reality of warfare.

Name: Charmed
description: "Damn! Akusb got charmed by succubus again! Someone go get some water, beer and a stick!"

Name: Bewitched
description: "Damn! Akusb got bewitched by mermaids this time! Go get get a compass, a priest, and a monkey here!"

Name: Paralysed
description: Paralysed and unable to act, this unit is now an easy target for coup de grace.

Name: Knock Down
description: No matter how many time you get knocked down, only by getting up is when you can fight again.

Name: Aging
description: The flow of time is unstoppable, but the process of life can be accelerated.

Name: Disarmed
description: Losing weapon is a shame any warrior worth their salt should reconsider their life. But now is a good time to run.

Name: Bleeding
description: Bleeding wound is often not much emergency issue in face of life and death in battle. Such wound still takes its toll in long term though.

Name: Marked
description: Marked for death to embrace the grip of life. Endure the pain and you may live to see another day.

Name: Weaken
description: Weaken but not unwilling to fight. May the lord grants them strength once again.

Name: Smoke
description: Smoke reduce the sight of the unit making it less effective in combat but improve range defense.

Name: Suppressed
description: This unit is being suppressed by range attacks making them almost unable to move but increase their range defense.

Name: Final Drive
description: Last dance of life, to embrace death willingly.

Name: Calm Berserk
description: Controlled chaos is nothing short of unnatural. By the process of intensive training. Calm berserk allows this unit to unleash its wrath without losing control.

Name: Breaching
description: Breaching through a mass of battalion is no easy task even for the finest cavalry force, hold fast and be tenecious.

Name: Angel Guardian
description: Receive 50% of damage from damage taken by nearby friendly squads

Name: Severe Burning
description: The burning become so severe now that simply drenching the fire may not save the person anymore. This also causes panic among the troop trying to flee from such fire.

Name: Drench
description: Wet from head to toes almost as if swimming in the water. Avoid cold temperature or air elemental damage at all cost.

Name: Cold
description: Cold and shivering, not a good sign for winter warfare. Find some place warm or light up the fire.

Name: Decimated
description: Decimation can increase morale of the troop for a short while so they can fight longer, before they realise that surrender maybe an option after all.

Name: Enraged
description: Anger clouded rational judgment. Exploit this momentary weakness or suffer the punishment.
